I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_BUILT_FROM: Dem build am from a unified passion for educational equality
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_BUILT_FROM_CO: Awa platform and everyting wen we don achieve so, na becos of many volunteers wen happy to work togeda with us. Take anoda step make you join awa community today!
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_CREATING: We deh make learning deh fun and effective for all the underprivileged children wey deh dis world.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_CREATING_BUTT: Come know more about Oppia work.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_CREATING_CONT: The Oppia foundation deh accomplish e mission by the creation and expansion of awa online learning platform, Oppia, wey we deh use story-based lessons and special features take catch the attention of underserved  students wey deh dis world.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_HEADING_CONTE: We dey build community wen go provide quality education for people wey no fit get quality education.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_MILLIONS_OF: Many Many children no dey fit get the kind beta education wey dem suppose get.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_MILLIONS_OF_C: Of the 61 million children worldwide who cannot attend primary school, 17 million will never step foot into a school if trends continue. Unfortunately, even those who are in school may not be getting the effective education they need.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_SECTION_SIX: You sef get role to play.
I18N_ABOUT_FOUNDATION_PAGE_WE_CANNOT: We no fit comot eye for the work wen quality education fit do to better pipo life.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_CREATE: Create wetin we dey call Exploration
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_CREATE_TEXT: Tori for topic wey you like
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_1: Wetin Oppia wan do na to help pipo make dem for learn wetin dey dia mind wella make body dey sweet dem too as e dem dey learn.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_2: As e dey create free, high-quality, lessons dey dem fit demonstrate with di help of pipu wey dey teach from around di world, Oppia dey aims to give students quality education — no mata wia dem dey or di traditional resources dey get access to.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_3: As e dey bi so, sabi pipo don create pass <[numberOfExplorations]> of dis confam lessons, wey we dey call explorations. And dem don serve almost <[numberofStudentsServed]> pikin dem for yonda.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_4: Dis explorations na wetin  dey help pikin sabi book in a way wey dem go gbadu am, dis metod dey use videos, picshure, and question wen no rili get ansa. And as most pikin dem dey always rison di same, Oppia  com dey allow sabi pipo fit help dis pikin dem dey rison correct-correct for inside dis exploration direct. This na to help dem give plenti pikin dem di correct help at di same time.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_5: If you bi pikin wey wan learn wit Oppia, you fit check awa explorations make you stat to dey learn.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_6: If you bi sabi ticha wey wan help dis pikin dem for aria and yonda, you fit apply to dey for awa Teach with Oppia program, wey wan help pikin dem sabi all dose tins wey dey crack dier brain.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_7: See ehn, if you teach with Oppia, e go help you get soft mind com sabi yarn wella with pipo, no bi only dat one o, you go help pikin dem wey dey area and yonda sabi dis book work wella. Or, if e neva sure you sey you wan teach, you fit tell us wetin you rison ontop wetin oda sabi pipo don do; dis wan go help di lesson stew for oda pikin dem.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_PARAGRAPH_8: Weda you bi K-12 ticha, universiti pikin, or pesin wey gbadu one veri subject con wan give OT, Oppia go welcome you. Enta di community make you start to folo us dey explore.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_ABOUT_TAB_SHARE_TEXT: wetin you don make for dis area.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_CREDITS_TAB_TEXT: Pipo wey gada put hand for Oppia dey for di whole world and mani of us na student some of us don comot for school and some of us still dey school den some of us na ticha. We go like troway salute for dis pipo wey gada put hand make Oppia for beta. If you go like put hand too, na like dis you go fit join hand!
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_CREDITS_TAB_TEXT_BOTTOM: Di pipo wey dey make Oppia beta wan thank dis pipo for the ogbonge idea wen dem bring wey dey help dem <[listOfNames]>.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_CREDITS_THANK_TRANSLATEW: Oppia go like troway salut for translatewiki.net sake of sey, dem dey bring different pipo wey dey translate wetin we dey do for dia mama language make e for no loss.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_EXPLORE_LESSONS: Check di tiching wey pipo for dis villa don do
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_EXPLORE_LESSONS_CONTENT: Sabi pipo plus pipo for dis villa wey dey for yonda dey use Oppia class as wia dem dey make and share anitin wey concern book wok or lesin. If you obsav dis area wella you go see sey we get ova 20,000 book wok for 17 different subjects, maybi dat wan fit ginga you to make ya own lesin.
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_FOUNDATION_TAB_DONATE_BU: Show us love for awa aza
I18N_ABOUT_PAGE_FOUNDATION_TAB_PARAGRAPH: Di Oppia website and source code join get dia backin from Oppia Foundation, a tax-exempt 501(c)(3) wey dey do osho-fri wok for pipo, dia domot dey for di State of California.
Di foundation dey put mind for the yanfu-yanfu support of kampe people them wey dey for yonda, wey go join hand help people wey wan sabi anitin wey dem want for jollification.
If you go like join di plenti pipo wey dey put hand for wetin Oppia dey do, abeg try sabi as you go fit bless your pipo for Oppia Foundation or join hand for oda mata wey dey ground.
Awa Oga kpatakpata dem for hia na Ben Henning, Jacob Davis, and Sean Lip. Di foundashun bylaws and minutes dey for dia make you read.If you wan halla us, abeg email admin@oppia.org

I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_1: To create exploration dey easy and free. Share wetin you sabi with students wey dey around di world, and get feedback you fit use take make your exploration effectiveness beta.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_10: For addition, as learners dey use your exploration, you go fit see di common errors dem dey make. Sometimes e fit reveal new tins about wia dem dey confused. E dey easy to augment di exploration wit anoda feedback if you tink sey oda learners dey likely to repeat di errors. You fit even send di learner to a different step, or "dey go deeper" by asking anoda question.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_11: If you want dey involved for di Oppia project and help us achieve our mission of free, high-quality universal education, reach us for admin@oppia.org, or discover more ways to get involved wit our community of volunteers. We dey happi to hear from you!
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_2: All wetin you need to take start na topic wey you wan teach. You fit create exploration about any topic, weda big or small. Di right size of topic for any exploration na one wey you go fit cover for a single class. You fit also create more dan wan related explorations wey dem intend to complete in sequence. collection.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_3: Wen you don choose a topic, just click ‘Create’, and log in wit your Google account. If you no get Google account, you fit create one here.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_4: An exploration dey consist of multiple steps. Each step fit get text (e.g. explanation wey dem write), pictures and video. Each step dey present di student wit question, wey dey must attempt so dat dem go kontinu. E fit be multiple choice question, or a type of sometin in, or be any of a nomba of oda interactions.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_5: Once the learner don start the question, oppia go give them feedback make dem for kontinu to the next step. To take see how learners dey experience Oppia, you fit try one of these explorations:
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_6: More information about how to take create explorations dey here in our user documentation.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_7: Once you don create your exploration and you don ready to see am, click the 'publish' button for the top page. This wan go make your exploration dey available for learners around the world!
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_8: After you don publish the exploration, you fit share am with this link, or even embed am for your own web page.
I18N_GET_STARTED_PAGE_PARAGRAPH_9: When learners go through your exploration,dem fit send you feedback to alert you on the problems wey dey or dem fit share ideas to take make am better

I18N_MATH_COURSE_DETAILS: Oppia select math foundation courses wey go teach you everything for maths from foundation wey you go need for mathematics. The course go teach you things wey important like addition, multiplication, and fractions. When you don know all these them important concepts wey oyinbo dey call basic, you go waka go more advanced lessons (this one senior pass the basic lesson). Every new topic be like building block on top the one wey you just learn finish so you fit start from beginning and finish the lesson from any skill level or you fit just jump inside if you need help for one particular topic.

I18N_PARTNERSHIPS_PAGE_FREQUENTLY_ASKED_: Wetin be the thing wey Oppia dey ask from awa (our) organization (Company)?

E depend on the kain partnership wey bin dey ground. From the beginning, we go work with una to know as our mission or goals relate and how Oppia fit give una support. After that one, we go come join hand with una to set some kain targets wey we go follow for the whole partnership period.
. As e be say partnership dey involve investment from both sides, e go better make una give us one person from una side wey sabi English well wey we go dey follow talk everytime for the time of the partnership.

The kin partnership wey Oppia get with different Organizations dey unique. We dey try arrange with organizations to meet with them biggest needs. E fit be say make we help the organizations them join Oppia inside programme wey them get and provide the resources we better for the students, teachers and parents.
We fit help the organization them put programming wey dey sustainable. Make you contact our partnerships team lead, Melanie, for this email partnerships-support@oppia.org, make we see how Oppia fit take work with your organization.
Oppia fit send volunteers them come our area?

E fit be so. The one depend on the kin partnership goal wey we don agree on top and if people dey for the area wey go volunteer to work for Oppia. E dey important for us say we do partnership wey go give the most impact for inside the area (region) and this one sef fit include make we dey support and help the organization and the community volunteers them from where we dey make una fit enjoy the program bokku.
We fit use Oppia lesson for my area (or region)?

Yes O! The Oppia lessons classroom lessons them get high quality, the sessions dey engaging and you fit find am and e dey useful for any area. Users fit also create and upload them own lessons to the Oppia platform.
If e go help make we map your area (region) curriculum to awa lessons, abeg make you tell us ( and if you fit send us the curriculum sef, e go better) at partnerships-support@oppia.org.
Oppia go gree translate them lessons to the language for our area (or region)?

The Oppia team dey happy to waka with partners wey wan do translations. Holla our Partnerships Team lead, Melanie, for this email address, partnerships-support@oppia.org, make una sabi as your organization fit partner with Oppia to provide educational materials wey pipo fit understand and use for your area.

I18N_PLAYBOOK_COMMUNITY_GUIDELINES_GUIDE: We welcome everyone make dem come play and give any response on top di explorations wey don dey published. . With di help of all of una, we fit dey always improve di lessons wey dey on top we site make them fit dey more effective as e suppose be.
Make you dey use better judgement when you dey publish di explorations dem. The explorations dem suppose get ogbonge educational value and e nor fit get anytin like advert, spam, vandalism or abuse.

Abeg make you be good citizen. If you create more dan one account, abuse people for di response wey you dey give, use explorations deceive users or do anytin wey be bad behaviour, e go make us suspend your account as we nor dey tolerate dose kin behaviours dem.

I18N_PLAYBOOK_PUBLICATION_INSTRUCTIONS_H: How you go fit make your explorations publishable.
I18N_PLAYBOOK_PUBLICATION_INSTRUCTIONS_I: Dey teach sometin wey get sense (or wey get better meaning- Try dey bring information wey dey new to di people wey go learn am — nor dey try test if dem sabi wetin we bin dey guess say dem already suppose know. Also, if you wan teach topic wey don dey inside exploration wey bin dey ground, try submit feedback inside dat same exploration wey go make dat exploration beta instead — na dis one easy pass!

Dey teach pass small matter wey people don think say na fact- When you dey choose topics try dey choose either di one wey get complex matter or di one wey get plenty parts and levels wey relate or the one wey don become facts wey dey interesting. E go better make we see as di topic take dey progress and the challenge too make di learner fit get chance to apply di concept wey dem just learn even for situation wey dem nor too sabi or never see before.

Dey give response/feedback wey dey give information- Nor just tell learners whether dem get am abi dem nor get am. Yarn di reason or try wel wel to hep dem make dem fit understand where dem make di mistake. Use different ways take explain give di learners, you fit even hide hint inside question wey you dey ask and dis one go give di learners dem new and useful insights.

Cross check- Make sure say you write your exploration well, make person fit read am well. E no suppose get any mistake for inside typing, fact and bugs as e be say di learners fit nor believe am again.

Make sure say your representation balance well- Di learning objectives dey show di learners wey dey browse wetin dey inside di exploration and as e be so, e suppose show wetin them go learn for inside di exploration. Di exploration suppose give all di tins wey you promise inside di learning objective and for inside di exploration.

Make sure say you dey yarn better Di best explorations dem dey be like person wey dey yarn tori and e get better feedback. E dey give learners chance to think about wetin you bin dey teach, dey make dem try di new tins wey dem dey learn and e dey give beta feedback on top dir work.
I18N_PLAYBOOK_PUBLICATION_INSTRUCTIONS_P: When exploration don dey published, e go carry your name and anyone go fit learn am. Make we for fit allow students enjoy wetin dem dey learn, see some tips wey we don find useful:
If you need more help on top how you go take write beta feedback and explorations wey balance, check this our Design Tips page.
I18N_PLAYBOOK_PUBLICATION_POLICY_PARAGRA: Anybody wey get private exploration fit publish am at any time. But if di exploration nor good (or e get low-quality), awa moderators dem fit commot am from publication come give you feedback on top how you go take make am beta.

Explorations suppose always dey get improvement make e for fit better and anyone wey dem never touch for long, we fit see am say e nor get owner. If dat one happen, di moderators go decide if dem go transfer di ownership go Oppia community make di exploration fit dey improved.
